sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom content to the form. This will not be sent in e-mail messages.

fields.label: Subimission notice
fields.name: subimission_notice
fields.instructions: Text to display when form is submitted.

fields.label: Notify email addresses
fields.name: notify
fields.instructions: Notifications will be sent to below added email addresses when receiving a new form submission.

fields.label: Custom email subject
fields.name: notification_custom_subject
fields.message: Check this box if you want to enter a custom email subject.

fields.label: Email subject
fields.name: notification_subject
fields.instructions: Enter custom email subject. Default is "New form submission".

fields.label: Notification data
fields.name: submission_notice_data
fields.message: Show submission data in notice content

fields.label: Allow sender copy
fields.name: allow_sender_copy
fields.instructions: Send copy of the submitted form data to the sender email.
fields.message: Yes, allow user to get a copy of the submission

fields.label: Custom email subject for submission copy
fields.name: copy_custom_subject
fields.message: Check this box if you want to enter a custom email subject.

fields.label: Email subject
fields.name: copy_subject
fields.instructions: Enter custom email subject. Default is "Form submission copy".

fields.label: Sender copy message
fields.name: sender_copy_message
fields.instructions: The message that will be sent to the user together with a list of the submitted data.
